body_html:
I have no thoughts because I don't really understand the problem. Specifying a placeholder without shape allows feeding any shape data.

I don't think we register gradients for placeholders either. I think providing more context into what you're trying to do will help us out.

body:
I have no thoughts because I don't really understand the problem.  Specifying a placeholder without shape allows feeding any shape data.

I don't think we register gradients for placeholders either.  I think providing more context into what you're trying to do will help us out.
